select dept_code, dept_name, units, drug_code, drug_name, package_spec, firm_id, is_anti, toxi_property, sum(cost) costs, sum(amount) amounts from dr_drugdoctordeptcost dg where 1=1
and dr_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and dr_date <= to_date(#{pd.endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and drug_name = #{pd.drug_name}
and DEPT_NAME = #{pd.DEPT_NAME}
and DISPENSARY_NAME = #{pd.DISPENSARY_NAME}
and TOXI_PROPERTY = #{pd.TOXI_PROPERTY}
group by dept_code,dept_name,units,drug_code,drug_name ,package_spec,firm_id,is_anti,toxi_property
order by sum(cost) desc
order by drug_code
order by firm_id
order by sum(cost) asc
order by sum(cost) desc
order by dept_code

SELECT s.ordered_by_dept dept_name, nvl(SUM(s.costs),0) med, nvl(SUM(DECODE(m.is_anti, '1', s.costs, 0)),0) anti, nvl(SUM(DECODE(s.item_class, 'A', s.costs, 'B', s.costs, 0)),0) drug, nvl(COUNT(DISTINCT s.visit_no + s.visit_date),0) pat_sum FROM OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS s, (select distinct drug_no_local, is_anti from pdss.drug_map) m WHERE s.item_code = m.drug_no_local(+)
and visit_date >= to_date(#{beginDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and visit_date <= to_date(#{endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and ordered_by_dept = #{DEPT_NAME}
AND s.CHARGE_INDICATOR = '1' GROUP BY s.ordered_by_dept
order by SUM(s.costs)
order by SUM(s.costs)
order by SUM(s.costs) desc
order by SUM(DECODE(s.item_class, 'A', s.costs, 'B', s.costs, 0))
order by SUM(DECODE(s.item_class, 'A', s.costs, 'B', s.costs, 0)) desc
order by SUM(DECODE(m.is_anti, '1', s.costs, 0))
order by SUM(DECODE(m.is_anti, '1', s.costs, 0)) desc
